definition: Deng Yaping (1973-), table tennis player, several times world and Olympic winner
surname Deng
second/next to/inferior/sub-/Taiwan pr. [ya3]
Asia/Asian/Taiwan pr. [Ya3]
duckweed

sentences.english: Deng Yaping, you are the pride of our country!
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍，你是国家的骄傲。

sentences.english: He went on to take the championship.
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍在多次乒乓球赛中取得冠军。

sentences.english: Deng Yaping went to Tsinghua University ! majored in Englishand management in 1997.
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍在1997年在清华大学主修英语和管理专业。

sentences.english: Deng yapping goes toTsinghua University , majors in English and management .
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍去清华大学主修英语和管理专业。

sentences.english: DengYapeng holds world record for ping-pong .
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍连结了乒乓球的世界记录。

sentences.english: After all, Deng Yaping is a cut above her and won the first two sets, at ease.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟邓亚萍技高一筹，轻而易举地连胜两局。

sentences.english: Deng Yaping is a famous ping-pong player.
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍是意为著名的乒乓球运动员。

sentences.english: Deng Yaping is famous as a Pingpang player.
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍作为乒乓球运动员而出名。

sentences.english: The appointment of Deng Yaping as member of the International Olympic Committee excited us.
sentences.chinese: 邓亚萍被任命为国际奥委会委员，这使我们愉快不已。
